page.title: 02Changing Lifestyles
page.content: The person we interviewed was 94 years of age.We asked her 10 questions and she gave us some very interesting answers.We asked her about the fashion in those days and they wore dresses down to their ankles,black stockings and black shoes. The land cover in Kenley has not changed a lot but there were more fields and only a few houses.They did not have electric trains as they were all steam.There were no cars only horse and carriages and rich people usually had a very nice one. One woman lived in a caravan for the first few years of her life and then she moved into a cottage. We interviewed some old people on fashion.One old lady said before the Charleston short dresses were thought to be very unladylike , but not when the Charleston became popular.
